channel.title: Jaron Lanier on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Jaron Lanier on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Daniel Kwan and VR Pioneer Jaron Lanier to Discuss Storytelling Versus Algorithm at Studio B Salon
item.description: The private event will mark the end of the third edition of Vaster Than Empires (VTE), a speculative storytelling retreat hosted by Berggruen’s Studio B and its Future Humans program.
